  • Method Details

    • publish

      public static void publish(Log log)
      Publish a log message with the default meta information. This is minimal log message, there will be no timestamp, thread info, etc.
      Parameters:
      log - the log message to publish
      See Also:
      • Publisher.publish(Log)

    • publish

      public static void publish(Log log, Meta meta)
      Publish a log message and it's included meta information.
      Parameters:
      log - the log message to publish
      meta - the meta information for the given log
      See Also:
      • Publisher.publish(Log, Meta)
